experiment.name: regression-test
experiment.setup:
set StartYear 2021 set SetSeed true set replication 1 set VERBOSE false
set StartMonth 1 set Force "City of London"
set shift-1-CID 20 set shift-2-CID 20 set shift-3-CID 20
set shift-1-response 20 set shift-2-response 20 set shift-3-response 20
set non-crime-%-CID 0 set non-crime-%-RESPONSE 0
set show-workload false set event-file-out false
setup
